TextEng: Nothing yet.
No, farewell.
The mayor and his assistant are dead and will not stop you.
Text: 시장과 조수는 죽었고 더 이상 당신을 막지 않을 거요.

TextEng: The mayor said it was fine for you to stay.
I am here to run you out of town, evil mage!
Text: 당신을 마을에서 쫓아내러 왔다, 사악한 마법사!

TextEng: I am afraid my appeal changed nothing.
Text: 제 호소가 아무것도 바꾸지 못한 것 같아요.

TextEng: I fear that the mayor is no longer listening to my advice.
Text: 시장이 더 이상 제 조언을 듣지 않는 것 같아요.

TextEng: If you don't like it, shut up and leave.
Text: 마음에 안 들면 입 다물고 떠나.

TextEng: I don't want to talk to you.
Goodbye.
What do you mean by that?
How do you know that?
Who are you calling uncouth?
How did you know who I was?
Actually I like this invigorating weather.
Text: 사실 난 이 상쾌한 날씨가 좋아요.

TextEng: I couldn't agree more.
Who are you?
A Red Wizard in Hilltop? Be gone before I strike you down!
Text: 힐탑에 붉은 마법사가? 내가 쓰러뜨리기 전에 꺼져!

TextEng: Good riddance.
What do you mean by that?
What is a Red Wizard doing in Hilltop?
Text: 붉은 마법사가 힐탑에서 뭘 하는 거죠?

TextEng: I would hear more before I judge you.
You expect me to believe that?
Tell me more.
Sounds awfully noble.
Get to the point where I'm supposed to be interested.
I would like to ask you some questions.
That's all the questions I have.
I will end your evil existence right now!
Text: 지금 당장 당신의 사악한 존재를 끝장내주지!

TextEng: I will not help you. You must leave our village alone.
Text: 당신을 돕지 않겠어요. 우리 마을에서 떠나요.

TextEng: I will return.
Do you have anything for sale?
Don't the Red Wizards usually travel with slaves?
Text: 붉은 마법사단은 보통 노예를 데리고 다니지 않나요?

TextEng: Sounds like a lucrative prospect for you and the village.
Text: 당신과 마을 모두에게 수익성 좋은 전망이군요.

TextEng: I cannot allow you to bring slaves to this village.
Text: 이 마을에 노예를 데려오게 둘 수 없어요.

TextEng: So would you help defend the town if you had an enclave here?
Text: 여기 거점이 생기면 마을 방어를 도와줄 건가요?

TextEng: So you plan to bring slavery to Hilltop?
No, I will not help you spread your evil!
Text: 안 돼, 당신의 악행을 퍼뜨리는 건 돕지 않겠어!

TextEng: What exactly are the Red Wizards?
That sounds like a horrible childhood.
The more Thayvian that die, the better off the world is.
Text: 테이 사람들이 더 많이 죽을수록 세상이 더 좋아지지.

TextEng: Quit your whining; life is hard all over.
If it is so hard, why do it?
I have no interest in helping you.
How much is this worth to you?
That's not enough.
I'll see what I can do.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> How about some gold upfront?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 금화를 먼저 좀 주는 건 어때요?

TextEng: I will be back.
Why would you come to such a small village?
Text: 왜 이렇게 작은 마을에 온 거죠?

TextEng: Is that why you are here?
Why would I walk away?
